message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a method for semantic annotation of news articles using a knowledge base, and a search engine that supports both keyword-based search and structured data search. This involves techniques from information retrieval (IR), natural language processing (NLP), and machine learning (ML), which are relevant to the sub-categories of cs.IR, cs.CL, and cs.AI. The use of a knowledge base also suggests relevance to the sub-categories of cs.DB and cs.LG, which deal with data management and machine learning, respectively.
